title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Approach Landing Airbus A320
description:
In this how to we are going to look how you can use the functions in an Airbus A320 using the a32nx mod. We just received information from ATC about which runway is assigned to us and the first thing we are going to do is program the MCDU and make it ready for the approach and landing at Sankt-Petersburg Pulkovo Airport.

To make somethings easier I have used the a32nx mod which can be downloaded from the site below:
https://github.com/flybywiresim/a32nx
